intro: Psychotria frakei, commonly known as the Hawaiian psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as rainforests and coastal areas. Psychotria frakei is also notable for its potential ethnobotanical uses among indigenous Hawaiian communities.
